CustomField.formula: 20*(150* Number_of_Products__c - ( if (text( Number_of_Births__c ) = "Single", CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 1,0, 2, 25, 3, 75, 0), if (text(Number_of_Births__c) = "Twins", CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 2,0, 3, 25, 4, 50, 5, 100, 6, 150, 0), if (text(Number_of_Births__c) = "Triplets", CASE (Number_of_Products__c, 3,0, 6, 75, 9, 225, 0), 0)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculates Annual Storage for 20 years based on Number of Products; includes Bundle Savings.
CustomField.label: ASP Old
